lead_paragraph: Investors have felt plenty of anxiety about the elections, interest rates, China, Europe and jobs. But the market has rebounded to near-record heights.

headline.print_headline: The Market Is Optimistic, So What’s Your Excuse?
headline.main: The Stock Market Is Optimistic, So What’s Your Excuse?

snippet: Investors have felt plenty of anxiety about the elections, interest rates, China, Europe and jobs. But the market has rebounded to near-record heights.
abstract: The Upshot; latest stock rally has persisted despite host of economic concerns that might make ordinary investors take gloomy outlook; persistent bearishness has in past been reliable signal to purchase stock, but latest rise has made many shares seem expensive in comparison to corporate earnings and expected future earnings; investors are advised to remain cautious but avoid pessimism.
